compileResource

public java.lang.Object compileResource(java.lang.String resource)
                                 throws javax.script.ScriptException,
                                        SmartFrogException,
                                        java.rmi.RemoteException
Compile the script. Only works if canCompile() is true

Parameters:
resource - resource to load
Returns:
the compiled script
Throws:
javax.script.ScriptException - parse/compile problems
java.lang.ClassCastException - the engine does not compile
SmartFrogException - problems loading the resource
java.rmi.RemoteException - network probems

bindAttributes

public void bindAttributes()
Bind the attributes of the owner to the script context.

resolveAndEvaluate

public java.lang.Object resolveAndEvaluate(java.lang.String attrResource,
                                           java.lang.String attrInline)
                                    throws SmartFrogException,
                                           java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                           javax.script.ScriptException
Resolve the resource and inline attributes (both of which must be present),
  1. If the resource attribute resolves to a non-empty string, then the attribute RemoteScriptPrim.ATTR_SF_SCRIPT_CODE_BASE is resolved and prepended to the resource attribute; the resource is then loaded and executed
  2. If the inline attribute resolves to a non-empty string, it is evaluated

Parameters:
attrResource - name of an attribute that should resolve to a resource
attrInline - name of an an attribute containing an inline string
Returns:
the result of the evaluation, or null if neither got evaluated
Throws:
SmartFrogException - Failure to load the resource, resolve attributes
java.rmi.RemoteException - network problems
javax.script.ScriptException - if the script failed
